name: Claims Processing Platform Development & Deployment
description: End-to-end development, testing, and deployment of claims processing microservices from design through production release. Encompasses architecture decisions, code development, automated testing, security validation, and infrastructure provisioning.
objective: Deliver scalable, reliable claims processing capabilities that integrate with AI-powered assessment tools while maintaining system performance and regulatory compliance.

tasks.name: Define Claims Processing Platform Architecture & Microservices Design
tasks.description: Establish the overall system architecture, microservices boundaries, API contracts, and integration points with AI-powered assessment tools.
tasks.expected_output: Architecture design document, microservices specification, API contracts, system integration diagrams, technology stack recommendations

tasks.name: Conduct Security & Compliance Requirements Assessment
tasks.description: Identify and document all regulatory compliance requirements (HIPAA, SOC 2, state insurance laws) and security controls needed for claims processing platform.
tasks.expected_output: Compliance requirements matrix, security control specifications, risk assessment report, regulatory mapping document

tasks.name: Design Cloud Infrastructure & Kubernetes Environment
tasks.description: Design scalable cloud infrastructure on AWS/Azure including Kubernetes clusters, networking, storage, and disaster recovery capabilities.
tasks.expected_output: Infrastructure-as-code templates, Kubernetes cluster specifications, network architecture diagrams, disaster recovery plan, cost estimates

tasks.name: Develop Core Claims Processing Microservices
tasks.description: Implement core microservices for claims intake, validation, routing, and processing with APIs for AI model integration.
tasks.expected_output: Microservice code repositories, API endpoints, database schemas, integration interfaces, code documentation

tasks.name: Implement AI Model Integration Layer
tasks.description: Develop integration layer connecting claims processing microservices with AI-powered claims assessment models for fraud detection and severity prediction.
tasks.expected_output: AI integration code, model serving infrastructure, feature engineering pipelines, model input/output specifications, integration tests

tasks.name: Build Data Pipelines for Claims Processing
tasks.description: Design and implement ETL pipelines to ingest, transform, and validate claims data for processing, analytics, and AI model training.
tasks.expected_output: Data pipeline code, ETL specifications, data quality frameworks, data lineage documentation, performance optimization reports

primary_role.title: Senior Data Engineer - Data Pipeline Architecture

tasks.name: Configure Database Infrastructure & Optimization
tasks.description: Set up and optimize relational and NoSQL databases for claims processing, including replication, indexing, and performance tuning.
tasks.expected_output: Database schemas, configuration scripts, performance baselines, backup/recovery procedures, capacity planning documentation

tasks.name: Develop Comprehensive Test Strategy & Test Plans
tasks.description: Create detailed test plans covering functional, integration, performance, security, and compliance testing for the claims processing platform.
tasks.expected_output: Test strategy document, test plans, test case specifications, acceptance criteria, testing schedule, risk-based testing matrix

tasks.name: Implement Automated API & Integration Tests
tasks.description: Develop and deploy automated test suites for microservice APIs, third-party integrations, and AI model interfaces using industry-standard frameworks.
tasks.expected_output: Automated test code, test execution reports, CI/CD pipeline integration, test coverage metrics, defect tracking documentation

primary_role.title: Test Automation Engineer - API & Integration Testing

tasks.name: Conduct Security Testing & Vulnerability Assessment
tasks.description: Perform comprehensive security testing including penetration testing, vulnerability scanning, and threat modeling to identify and remediate security risks.
tasks.expected_output: Security test reports, vulnerability assessment findings, threat model documentation, remediation recommendations, security sign-off

tasks.name: Execute Performance & Load Testing
tasks.description: Conduct performance testing, load testing, and stress testing to validate system scalability, response times, and resource utilization under expected and peak loads.
tasks.expected_output: Performance test results, load test reports, bottleneck analysis, optimization recommendations, performance baselines, capacity planning data

primary_role.title: Test Automation Engineer - API & Integration Testing

tasks.name: Establish CI/CD Pipelines & Deployment Automation
tasks.description: Build and configure continuous integration and continuous deployment pipelines with automated testing, security scanning, and infrastructure provisioning.
tasks.expected_output: CI/CD pipeline code, deployment scripts, infrastructure-as-code templates, pipeline documentation, automated deployment procedures

tasks.name: Conduct User Acceptance Testing & Compliance Validation
tasks.description: Execute user acceptance testing with business stakeholders and validate compliance with regulatory requirements and business process requirements.
tasks.expected_output: UAT test results, compliance validation report, defect logs, sign-off documentation, regulatory compliance attestation

tasks.name: Plan & Execute Production Deployment
tasks.description: Coordinate and execute the production deployment of claims processing platform with rollback procedures, monitoring setup, and incident response readiness.
tasks.expected_output: Deployment plan, deployment scripts, runbooks, monitoring dashboards, incident response procedures, deployment sign-off

tasks.name: Monitor, Optimize & Document Post-Deployment Operations
tasks.description: Establish production monitoring, performance optimization, document operational procedures, and conduct post-deployment review for continuous improvement.
tasks.expected_output: Monitoring dashboards, performance optimization reports, operational runbooks, post-deployment review documentation, lessons learned

name: Underwriting System Enhancement & Risk Model Integration
description: Complete lifecycle of developing and deploying underwriting platform updates, including backend service enhancements, ML model integration, API development, and comprehensive testing across risk assessment and pricing algorithms.
objective: Enable accurate risk assessment and competitive policy pricing through seamless integration of machine learning models with underwriting systems.

tasks.name: Define Underwriting System Enhancement Requirements & Risk Model Specifications
tasks.description: Collaborate with business stakeholders, underwriters, and actuaries to document functional requirements, risk assessment criteria, pricing algorithms, and ML model specifications for the underwriting platform enhancement.
tasks.expected_output: Comprehensive requirements document, risk model specifications, API contracts, and acceptance criteria

tasks.name: Design ML Model Architecture & Integration Framework
tasks.description: Design the machine learning model architecture for risk assessment and pricing, including model selection, feature engineering approach, and integration patterns with underwriting backend services.
tasks.expected_output: ML model architecture document, feature engineering specifications, model integration design, and data flow diagrams

supporting_roles.title: Senior Data Engineer - Data Pipeline Architecture

tasks.name: Establish Data Pipeline & Feature Store Infrastructure
tasks.description: Design and implement scalable data pipelines and feature store infrastructure to support ML model training, validation, and real-time feature serving for risk assessment.
tasks.expected_output: Data pipeline architecture, feature store implementation, ETL processes, and data quality frameworks

primary_role.title: Senior Data Engineer - Data Pipeline Architecture

tasks.name: Develop & Train ML Models for Risk Assessment & Pricing
tasks.description: Build, train, validate, and optimize machine learning models for risk assessment and policy pricing using historical underwriting data and feature engineering outputs.
tasks.expected_output: Trained ML models, model performance metrics, validation reports, and model cards documenting assumptions and limitations

supporting_roles.title: Senior Data Engineer - Data Pipeline Architecture

tasks.name: Design Cloud Infrastructure & Deployment Architecture
tasks.description: Design scalable, secure, and resilient cloud infrastructure on AWS/Azure to support underwriting system enhancements, including containerization, orchestration, and disaster recovery.
tasks.expected_output: Cloud architecture design document, infrastructure-as-code templates, Kubernetes configurations, and deployment strategy

tasks.name: Develop Backend Microservices & API Layer
tasks.description: Implement backend microservices for underwriting platform enhancements, including REST APIs for risk assessment, pricing calculation, and ML model integration with comprehensive error handling and logging.
tasks.expected_output: Microservices codebase, API endpoints, API documentation, and integration test suites

tasks.name: Implement ML Model Serving & Inference Pipeline
tasks.description: Deploy trained ML models to production using model serving frameworks, implement real-time inference pipelines, and establish model versioning and rollback mechanisms.
tasks.expected_output: Model serving infrastructure, inference API endpoints, model registry, and monitoring dashboards

tasks.name: Conduct Security Assessment & Compliance Review
tasks.description: Perform comprehensive security assessments, vulnerability scanning, and compliance reviews for underwriting system enhancements against HIPAA, SOC 2, and state insurance regulations.
tasks.expected_output: Security assessment report, vulnerability findings, compliance checklist, and remediation plan

tasks.name: Develop Comprehensive Test Strategy & Test Plans
tasks.description: Create detailed test strategy and comprehensive test plans covering functional testing, API integration testing, ML model validation, performance testing, and security testing for underwriting enhancements.
tasks.expected_output: Test strategy document, test plans, test cases, test data requirements, and acceptance criteria

supporting_roles.title: Test Automation Engineer - API & Integration Testing

tasks.name: Implement API & Integration Automated Test Suites
tasks.description: Develop and implement automated test suites for REST APIs, microservice integrations, and ML model inference endpoints using industry-standard testing frameworks and CI/CD integration.
tasks.expected_output: Automated test suites, test automation framework, CI/CD pipeline integration, and test execution reports

primary_role.title: Test Automation Engineer - API & Integration Testing

tasks.name: Execute Functional & Risk Model Validation Testing
tasks.description: Perform comprehensive functional testing of underwriting workflows, validate ML model predictions against business rules, and verify risk assessment and pricing algorithm accuracy.
tasks.expected_output: Test execution reports, defect logs, validation results, and sign-off documentation from business stakeholders

tasks.name: Conduct Performance, Load & Stress Testing
tasks.description: Execute performance testing, load testing, and stress testing to validate system scalability, response times, and stability under peak underwriting transaction volumes.
tasks.expected_output: Performance test reports, load test results, bottleneck analysis, and performance optimization recommendations

primary_role.title: Test Automation Engineer - API & Integration Testing

tasks.name: Prepare Production Deployment & Rollback Strategy
tasks.description: Develop detailed deployment procedures, rollback strategies, runbooks, and communication plans for production release of underwriting system enhancements with minimal business disruption.
tasks.expected_output: Deployment runbook, rollback procedures, deployment checklist, communication plan, and incident response procedures

tasks.name: Execute Production Deployment & System Validation
tasks.description: Deploy underwriting system enhancements to production environment following deployment procedures, execute smoke tests, validate system functionality, and monitor for issues.
tasks.expected_output: Deployment completion report, smoke test results, production validation sign-off, and monitoring dashboards

tasks.name: Monitor, Optimize & Establish Ongoing Support
tasks.description: Monitor production system performance, ML model accuracy, and business metrics; implement optimizations based on real-world usage patterns; establish ongoing support procedures and model retraining schedules.
tasks.expected_output: Monitoring dashboards, performance optimization recommendations, support procedures, model retraining schedule, and post-deployment review report

description: Full development-to-production workflow for customer-facing web and mobile applications, including UI/UX implementation, responsive design validation, functional testing, and user acceptance testing across multiple devices and browsers.
objective: Deliver intuitive, reliable customer experiences for policy management and claims submission while ensuring cross-platform compatibility and usability.

tasks.name: Define Feature Requirements & UI/UX Specifications

tasks.expected_output: API test suites, integration test results, performance benchmarks, API contract validation reports, integration issue documentation

tasks.description: Execute security testing including authentication/authorization validation, data encryption verification, HIPAA/SOC 2 compliance checks, and vulnerability scanning.
tasks.expected_output: Security test report, vulnerability assessment, compliance checklist completion, penetration testing results, security recommendations

tasks.description: Execute performance testing to validate application response times, throughput, and stability under expected and peak user loads.
tasks.expected_output: Performance test results, load testing report, performance benchmarks, bottleneck analysis, optimization recommendations

objective: Enable data-driven decision-making across claims and underwriting functions through reliable, performant data infrastructure supporting analytics and AI model training.

name: Cloud Infrastructure Provisioning & Optimization
description: End-to-end cloud infrastructure design, deployment, and ongoing optimization including Kubernetes cluster management, serverless architecture implementation, disaster recovery configuration, and cost optimization across AWS/Azure environments.
objective: Provide secure, scalable, cost-efficient cloud infrastructure supporting all IT systems while ensuring high availability and disaster recovery capabilities.

tasks.name: Cloud Infrastructure Requirements Assessment & Architecture Design
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive assessment of current infrastructure needs, business requirements, and design scalable cloud architecture for AWS/Azure environments including Kubernetes and serverless components.
tasks.expected_output: Cloud architecture design document with infrastructure topology, component specifications, scalability requirements, and technology stack recommendations

tasks.name: Security & Compliance Requirements Definition
tasks.description: Define security policies, compliance requirements (HIPAA, SOC 2, state insurance laws), and disaster recovery specifications for cloud infrastructure.
tasks.expected_output: Security and compliance requirements document including encryption standards, access controls, audit logging, disaster recovery RTO/RPO targets, and regulatory compliance checklist

tasks.name: Cost Optimization Strategy & Budget Planning
tasks.description: Develop cloud cost optimization strategy including reserved instances, auto-scaling policies, resource tagging, and budget allocation across AWS/Azure services.
tasks.expected_output: Cost optimization plan with pricing models, reserved capacity recommendations, auto-scaling thresholds, monitoring dashboards, and projected monthly/annual costs

tasks.name: Network Architecture & Hybrid Connectivity Design
tasks.description: Design hybrid cloud network architecture including VPC/VNet configuration, ExpressRoute/Direct Connect setup, load balancing, and network security controls.
tasks.expected_output: Network design document with VPC/VNet topology, subnet allocation, routing policies, connectivity diagrams, firewall rules, and load balancer configuration

tasks.name: Kubernetes Cluster Architecture & Configuration Planning
tasks.description: Design Kubernetes cluster architecture including node groups, container registry setup, ingress controllers, service mesh, and resource quotas for production workloads.
tasks.expected_output: Kubernetes architecture specification with cluster topology, node sizing, storage classes, networking policies, RBAC configuration, and deployment strategies

tasks.name: Serverless Architecture & Function Design
tasks.description: Design serverless architecture for appropriate workloads including Lambda/Azure Functions, API Gateway, event-driven processing, and integration patterns.
tasks.expected_output: Serverless architecture design document with function specifications, event sources, API endpoints, scaling policies, and integration with other cloud services

tasks.name: Disaster Recovery & Business Continuity Planning
tasks.description: Develop comprehensive disaster recovery plan including backup strategies, failover mechanisms, RTO/RPO targets, and business continuity procedures across regions.
tasks.expected_output: Disaster recovery plan document with backup schedules, replication strategies, failover procedures, recovery runbooks, and testing schedule

tasks.name: Infrastructure-as-Code Development & Version Control Setup
tasks.description: Develop Infrastructure-as-Code templates (Terraform/CloudFormation) for reproducible infrastructure deployment and establish version control practices.
tasks.expected_output: IaC code repository with Terraform/CloudFormation modules, variable definitions, state management configuration, and CI/CD pipeline for infrastructure changes

tasks.name: Monitoring, Logging & Observability Framework Implementation
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive monitoring, logging, and observability solutions including CloudWatch/Azure Monitor, centralized logging, distributed tracing, and alerting.
tasks.expected_output: Monitoring and observability architecture with dashboards, log aggregation configuration, alert rules, SLO definitions, and runbooks for common issues

tasks.name: CI/CD Pipeline Development & Deployment Automation
tasks.description: Build automated CI/CD pipelines for infrastructure and application deployment with testing gates, approval workflows, and rollback capabilities.
tasks.expected_output: Fully functional CI/CD pipeline configuration with build stages, automated testing, deployment automation, approval workflows, and rollback procedures

objective: Maintain regulatory compliance and protect sensitive customer and business data through proactive threat management and continuous security risk mitigation.

tasks.name: Establish Security Compliance Framework & Regulatory Requirements Mapping
tasks.description: Define comprehensive security compliance framework aligned with HIPAA, SOC 2, and state insurance regulations applicable to Acme Corporation's operations.
tasks.expected_output: Compliance requirements matrix, regulatory mapping document, and security control framework baseline

tasks.name: Conduct Comprehensive Threat Landscape Assessment
tasks.description: Analyze current and emerging cyber threats specific to the insurance industry and Acme Corporation's technology environment.
tasks.expected_output: Threat landscape report, threat actor profiles, attack vector analysis, and risk prioritization matrix

tasks.name: Design Vulnerability Management Program & Assessment Strategy
tasks.description: Develop comprehensive vulnerability management program including assessment methodologies, scanning schedules, and remediation workflows.
tasks.expected_output: Vulnerability management policy, assessment schedule, scanning tool specifications, and remediation SLAs

tasks.name: Implement Automated Vulnerability Scanning Infrastructure
tasks.description: Deploy and configure automated vulnerability scanning tools across all systems, applications, and cloud infrastructure.
tasks.expected_output: Configured scanning tools, scanning dashboards, baseline vulnerability reports, and integration with CI/CD pipelines

tasks.name: Execute Initial Comprehensive Vulnerability Assessment
tasks.description: Perform baseline vulnerability scanning and assessment across all systems, applications, databases, and cloud infrastructure.
tasks.expected_output: Comprehensive vulnerability inventory, severity-ranked findings report, affected systems mapping, and remediation recommendations

tasks.name: Plan & Schedule Penetration Testing Engagements
tasks.description: Develop penetration testing strategy, select testing scope, schedule engagements, and establish rules of engagement.
tasks.expected_output: Penetration testing plan, scope document, engagement schedule, rules of engagement, and vendor/team assignments

tasks.name: Conduct Penetration Testing & Security Assessments
tasks.description: Execute planned penetration testing engagements simulating real-world attacks to identify exploitable vulnerabilities and security weaknesses.
tasks.expected_output: Penetration test reports, vulnerability findings, exploitation proof-of-concepts, and remediation recommendations

tasks.name: Develop Vulnerability & Penetration Finding Remediation Plan
tasks.description: Prioritize identified vulnerabilities and penetration test findings, assign ownership, and create detailed remediation roadmap with timelines.
tasks.expected_output: Prioritized remediation plan, remediation tickets, owner assignments, timeline, and success metrics

tasks.name: Execute Vulnerability Remediation & Patching Program
tasks.description: Implement fixes for identified vulnerabilities, apply security patches, and verify remediation effectiveness across all systems.
tasks.expected_output: Patched systems, remediation verification reports, patch deployment logs, and closure documentation

tasks.name: Conduct Compliance Audit Against Regulatory Requirements
tasks.description: Perform comprehensive audit of security controls, policies, and procedures against HIPAA, SOC 2, and state insurance regulatory requirements.
tasks.expected_output: Compliance audit report, control assessment results, gap analysis, findings documentation, and remediation recommendations

tasks.name: Establish Security Incident Response Program & Procedures
tasks.description: Design comprehensive incident response program including detection procedures, escalation protocols, response playbooks, and communication plans.
tasks.expected_output: Incident response plan, detection procedures, escalation matrix, incident playbooks, communication templates, and training materials

tasks.name: Implement Security Monitoring & Threat Detection Systems
tasks.description: Deploy SIEM, EDR, and threat detection tools to enable continuous monitoring and real-time detection of security incidents.
tasks.expected_output: Configured monitoring tools, detection rules, alert thresholds, dashboards, and integration with incident response systems

tasks.name: Conduct Security Incident Response Training & Drills
tasks.description: Train incident response team on procedures, conduct tabletop exercises, and execute simulated incident response drills to validate readiness.
tasks.expected_output: Training completion records, drill reports, identified gaps, procedure refinements, and team certification documentation

tasks.name: Establish Continuous Monitoring & Metrics Dashboard
tasks.description: Create comprehensive security metrics dashboard tracking vulnerability trends, compliance status, incident metrics, and security KPIs.
tasks.expected_output: Security metrics dashboard, KPI definitions, automated reporting, trend analysis, and executive summary reports

primary_role.title: Full Stack Developer - Internal Tools & Analytics

tasks.name: Develop Security Program Governance & Continuous Improvement Plan
tasks.description: Establish governance structure, define roles/responsibilities, schedule regular reviews, and implement continuous improvement processes for the security program.
tasks.expected_output: Governance charter, RACI matrix, review schedule, improvement roadmap, policy update procedures, and stakeholder communication plan

Implement Security Monitoring & Threat Detection Systems

name: CI/CD Pipeline Implementation & Release Management
description: Design and management of continuous integration/continuous deployment pipelines, automated testing integration, release orchestration, environment provisioning, and production deployment with monitoring and incident response.
objective: Enable rapid, reliable software delivery while maintaining code quality, system stability, and production performance through automated testing and deployment processes.

tasks.name: Define CI/CD Pipeline Architecture & Strategy
tasks.description: Establish the overall CI/CD pipeline architecture, tool selection, branching strategy, and deployment stages aligned with Acme's insurance compliance requirements.
tasks.expected_output: CI/CD architecture document, tool selection matrix, branching strategy guide, deployment stage definitions, and compliance mapping

tasks.name: Design Automated Testing Framework Integration
tasks.description: Design comprehensive automated testing framework covering unit tests, API integration tests, UI tests, and mobile tests integrated into the CI/CD pipeline.
tasks.expected_output: Testing framework architecture document, test automation tool specifications, test coverage targets, integration points with CI/CD pipeline

supporting_roles.title: Test Automation Engineer - API & Integration Testing

tasks.name: Establish Environment Provisioning & Infrastructure-as-Code
tasks.description: Design and implement infrastructure-as-code templates for automated provisioning of development, staging, and production environments across cloud platforms.
tasks.expected_output: IaC templates (Terraform/CloudFormation), environment configuration specifications, provisioning automation scripts, environment parity documentation

tasks.name: Configure Source Control & Code Repository Management
tasks.description: Set up Git repositories, branching strategies, code review workflows, and access controls for all development teams across claims, underwriting, and customer portal systems.
tasks.expected_output: Repository structure documentation, branching strategy guide, code review policies, access control matrix, webhook configurations

tasks.name: Implement Build Automation & Artifact Management
tasks.description: Configure automated build pipelines with compilation, dependency resolution, artifact generation, and artifact repository management for all application components.
tasks.expected_output: Build pipeline configurations, artifact repository setup, build automation scripts, dependency management policies, artifact versioning strategy

tasks.name: Develop Automated Unit & Integration Test Suites
tasks.description: Create comprehensive automated test suites for unit testing, API integration testing, and system integration testing with coverage targets exceeding 80% for critical systems.
tasks.expected_output: Automated test suites, test case documentation, test data fixtures, test execution reports, coverage metrics dashboards

primary_role.title: Test Automation Engineer - API & Integration Testing

tasks.name: Create UI & Mobile Automated Test Automation
tasks.description: Develop automated UI and mobile test suites covering web portals and mobile applications across multiple browsers and devices with cross-platform compatibility testing.
tasks.expected_output: UI/mobile test automation frameworks, test scripts for critical user journeys, device/browser compatibility matrix, test execution reports, defect documentation

tasks.name: Establish Security Scanning & Compliance Checks
tasks.description: Integrate automated security scanning tools including SAST, DAST, dependency scanning, and compliance validation into the CI/CD pipeline to detect vulnerabilities early.
tasks.expected_output: Security scanning tool configurations, SAST/DAST policies, vulnerability threshold definitions, compliance check scripts, security reporting dashboards

tasks.name: Configure Deployment Orchestration & Release Pipelines
tasks.description: Design and implement automated release pipelines with multi-stage deployments, approval gates, rollback capabilities, and blue-green/canary deployment strategies.
tasks.expected_output: Release pipeline configurations, deployment stage definitions, approval workflow specifications, rollback procedures, deployment runbooks

tasks.name: Implement Production Monitoring & Observability
tasks.description: Establish comprehensive monitoring, logging, and alerting infrastructure for production systems including metrics collection, log aggregation, distributed tracing, and anomaly detection.
tasks.expected_output: Monitoring and alerting configurations, log aggregation setup, distributed tracing implementation, alert threshold definitions, observability dashboards

tasks.name: Establish Incident Response & Rollback Procedures
tasks.description: Define incident response protocols, escalation procedures, rollback strategies, and post-incident review processes for production incidents triggered by deployments.
tasks.expected_output: Incident response playbooks, escalation matrices, rollback procedures, on-call rotation schedules, post-incident review templates

tasks.name: Integrate Database Migration & Schema Management
tasks.description: Implement automated database migration tools and schema versioning strategies integrated into the CI/CD pipeline for safe, repeatable database changes.
tasks.expected_output: Database migration tool configurations, schema versioning strategy, migration validation scripts, rollback procedures, database change documentation

tasks.name: Configure Feature Flags & Progressive Deployment
tasks.description: Implement feature flag management system enabling progressive rollout, A/B testing, and safe feature releases without full deployments.
tasks.expected_output: Feature flag platform setup, feature flag management policies, progressive rollout strategies, A/B testing configurations, feature flag documentation

tasks.name: Establish CI/CD Pipeline Documentation & Training
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation, runbooks, and training materials for development teams on CI/CD pipeline usage, best practices, and troubleshooting.
tasks.expected_output: CI/CD pipeline documentation, developer runbooks, troubleshooting guides, training materials, video tutorials, FAQ documentation

tasks.name: Execute Pilot Deployment & Validation
tasks.description: Execute end-to-end pilot deployment using the complete CI/CD pipeline with a non-critical application to validate all components and identify gaps before production rollout.
tasks.expected_output: Pilot deployment execution report, validation test results, identified issues and resolutions, lessons learned documentation, readiness assessment

name: AI/ML Model Development & Production Deployment
description: End-to-end AI/ML solution lifecycle including model design, development, training, validation, performance optimization, and production deployment for claims fraud detection, severity prediction, risk assessment, and pricing models.
objective: Deliver AI-powered capabilities that improve claims processing efficiency, reduce fraud, enhance underwriting accuracy, and enable personalized customer experiences.

tasks.name: Define AI/ML Model Requirements & Business Objectives
tasks.description: Collaborate with business stakeholders to define model objectives, success metrics, regulatory constraints, and alignment with claims fraud detection, severity prediction, risk assessment, and pricing goals.
tasks.expected_output: Requirements document with model objectives, KPIs, regulatory compliance requirements, data requirements, and business success criteria

tasks.name: Assess Data Availability & Quality for Model Training
tasks.description: Evaluate existing claims, underwriting, and customer data sources to determine data completeness, quality, bias, and readiness for machine learning model training.
tasks.expected_output: Data assessment report including data inventory, quality metrics, identified gaps, bias analysis, and data preparation recommendations

primary_role.title: Senior Data Engineer - Data Pipeline Architecture

tasks.name: Design Data Pipeline & ETL Processes for Model Training
tasks.description: Design and architect scalable data pipelines to extract, transform, and load claims, underwriting, and customer data from multiple sources into a unified training dataset.
tasks.expected_output: Data pipeline architecture document, ETL process specifications, data transformation logic, and data quality validation rules

primary_role.title: Senior Data Engineer - Data Pipeline Architecture

tasks.name: Implement Data Pipeline Infrastructure & Validation
tasks.description: Build and deploy the data pipeline infrastructure on cloud platforms with automated data quality checks, monitoring, and error handling to ensure reliable training data availability.
tasks.expected_output: Deployed data pipeline with automated ETL jobs, data quality dashboards, monitoring alerts, and validation test results

tasks.name: Develop & Train AI/ML Models for Target Use Cases
tasks.description: Build and train machine learning models for claims fraud detection, severity prediction, risk assessment, and pricing using prepared training datasets with hyperparameter tuning and cross-validation.
tasks.expected_output: Trained model artifacts, model performance metrics, hyperparameter configurations, training logs, and model versioning documentation

tasks.name: Validate Model Performance & Conduct Bias Analysis
tasks.description: Evaluate trained models against validation datasets, assess performance metrics, conduct fairness and bias analysis, and validate compliance with regulatory requirements.
tasks.expected_output: Model validation report with performance metrics, bias assessment results, fairness analysis, regulatory compliance checklist, and recommendations for model improvements

tasks.name: Design Model Serving Architecture & API Integration
tasks.description: Design scalable model serving architecture with REST APIs, containerization, and integration points for claims processing, underwriting, and customer portal systems.
tasks.expected_output: Model serving architecture document, API specifications, containerization strategy, deployment topology, and integration design patterns

tasks.name: Implement Model Serving Infrastructure & Deployment Pipeline
tasks.description: Build containerized model serving infrastructure on Kubernetes with CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, logging, and automated deployment capabilities for production model updates.
tasks.expected_output: Deployed model serving infrastructure, Docker containers, Kubernetes manifests, CI/CD pipeline configuration, monitoring dashboards, and deployment documentation

tasks.name: Integrate AI Models with Claims Processing Platform
tasks.description: Integrate trained AI models into the claims processing microservices, implementing model inference calls, result caching, error handling, and fallback mechanisms.
tasks.expected_output: Integrated claims processing platform with AI model inference, API endpoints for fraud detection and severity prediction, integration test results, and technical documentation

supporting_roles.title: Test Automation Engineer - API & Integration Testing

tasks.name: Integrate AI Models with Underwriting Platform
tasks.description: Integrate risk assessment and pricing models into underwriting backend services, implementing model APIs, policy pricing calculations, and risk scoring workflows.
tasks.expected_output: Integrated underwriting platform with risk assessment and pricing models, API endpoints, pricing calculation logic, integration test results, and documentation

supporting_roles.title: Test Automation Engineer - API & Integration Testing

tasks.name: Develop AI-Powered Customer Portal Features
tasks.description: Build customer-facing features leveraging AI models including personalized recommendations, claims status predictions, and intelligent customer service interfaces in web and mobile applications.
tasks.expected_output: Customer portal features with AI integration, responsive UI/UX designs, backend APIs, mobile app implementations, and feature documentation

supporting_roles.title: Full Stack Developer - Internal Tools & Analytics

tasks.name: Conduct Comprehensive Testing & Quality Assurance
tasks.description: Execute functional, integration, API, UI, and performance testing across all AI-integrated systems including fraud detection, severity prediction, risk assessment, and customer portal features.
tasks.expected_output: Test plans, test cases, automated test suites, test execution reports, defect logs, performance test results, and UAT sign-off documentation

supporting_roles.title: Test Automation Engineer - API & Integration Testing

tasks.name: Implement Security, Compliance & Monitoring Controls
tasks.description: Implement security controls, data privacy measures, compliance monitoring, audit logging, and threat detection for AI/ML systems to ensure regulatory compliance and data protection.
tasks.expected_output: Security implementation documentation, compliance controls checklist, monitoring and alerting configuration, audit logs, security assessment results, and compliance certification

tasks.name: Deploy AI/ML Models to Production Environment
tasks.description: Execute controlled production deployment of AI/ML models with canary releases, monitoring, rollback procedures, and stakeholder communication to minimize business disruption.
tasks.expected_output: Production deployment plan, deployment execution logs, monitoring dashboards, rollback procedures, deployment sign-off, and post-deployment validation results

tasks.name: Establish Model Monitoring, Governance & Continuous Improvement
tasks.description: Implement ongoing model monitoring, performance tracking, data drift detection, governance frameworks, and continuous improvement processes to maintain model accuracy and business value.
tasks.expected_output: Model monitoring dashboards, governance policies, data drift detection alerts, model performance reports, retraining schedules, and continuous improvement roadmap

supporting_roles.title: Full Stack Developer - Internal Tools & Analytics
